txt_en: Life is about decisions.
Never start something you're not willing to finish.
We'll find the way.
It takes a brave man to admit his mistakes.
Success doesn't come for free.
Nothing stays the same forever.
You don't love people in hopes of a reward.
Girls have to go into the world and make up their own minds about things.
txt_cn: 女孩们，勇敢地去拥抱世界，决定自己的人生。

txt_en: Your happiness means a lot to me.
Stop whining and start living.
txt_cn: 停止无谓抱怨，学会直面生活。

txt_en: Friends tell the truth.
We're better off because of trees.
Everything is difficult before it is easy.
Paying attention to things—it's how we show love.
Things will work out the way they are meant to.
I may not always win, but I never back out of a fight.
txt_cn: 我并非总能赢，但我从未退缩。

txt_en: Some things are worth working a little harder for.
txt_cn: 有些事情是值得为之努力的。

txt_en: Life rarely gives you a chance to reverse a past regret.
Sometimes questions are more powerful than answers.
txt_cn: 有时候，提出问题比解决问题更重要。

txt_en: We must always travel in hope.
txt_cn: 在前行的路上，我们始终怀揣希望。

txt_en: Spring has sprung and life is returning.
We're family. We sink or swim together.
txt_cn: 无论幸福或苦痛，家人总能一起面对。

txt_en: Love is a part of all happiness.
You don't have to smile to be happy.
We all need the odd treat, or life becomes a little dull.
txt_cn: 平淡的生活里，总需要一些惊喜的瞬间。

txt_en: Good things take time.
To grow, we all need to suffer.
Forgiveness does not change the past, but it does enlarge the future.
txt_cn: 宽恕无法改变过去，却能拓宽未来。

txt_en: Never apologize for how you feel.
Routine is the building block of happiness.
txt_cn: 点滴日常构成幸福生活。

txt_en: Whatever happens, we will be ready.
txt_cn: 我们将竭尽全力，迎接各种挑战。
